Articles.Content:
Hello everybody in the kerboverse,

it\'s nice to be here and I\'m glad that I found this cool simulation. It\'s easy to control but it also offer many interesting features. I am very excited and interested in the further development. The $30 are definitely worth it! I\'m a developer, but not in C#. But I think I\'ll give it a try for the AddOns.

Yesterday, I sent my kerbonauts to Minmus and now they\'re orbiting the moon there. I don\'t know what these small, green, noseless guys eat (what do aliens eat?), so I hope they don\'t get hungry up there and eat each other instead... ???

Sorry for my bad english.. I hope it wasn\'t a torture.
Welcome! And no, your 'bad english' is not torture. It\'s not even bad.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
